title: Generate RSS feed for team logs
body_html:
So we do have the .json output for all the daily log activities ( for separate teams https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/activities.json?team_id=84 as well as all teams https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/activities.json), but this is not a format RSS readers can use.

We'd need to convert that somehow. This is something that came up not only in the discussion with mentors who want to keep track of their teams, but also with students wanting to add the feed to their Slack orga.

body:
So we do have the .json output for all the daily log activities ( for separate teams https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/activities.json?team_id=84 as well as all teams  https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/activities.json), but this is not a format RSS readers can use. 

We'd need to convert that somehow. This is something that came up not only in the discussion with mentors who want to keep track of their teams, but also with students wanting to add the feed to their Slack orga.
